con:request.name: Payment Create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_1" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:debtor:v2_1" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:creditor:v2_1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r <urn:paymentMessage>\r <urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:endToEndIdentification>\r </urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn3:categoryPurpose>SUPP</urn3:categoryPurpose>\r </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>2021-08-04+05:00</urn3:requestedExecutionDate>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:identification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn3:debtor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:id>\r <urn2:OrgId>\r <urn2:Id>4201</urn2:Id>\r </urn2:OrgId>\r </urn2:id>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:department>dep</urn2:department>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:subDepartment>subdep</urn2:subDepartment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:streetName>1</urn2:streetName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:buildingNumber>2</urn2:buildingNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:postCode>443</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>332</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:contactDetailsName>Name</urn2:contactDetailsName>\r </urn3:debtor>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK">\r <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:exchangeRateInformation>\r <urn2:exchangeRate>1</urn2:exchangeRate>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:rateType>AGRD</urn2:rateType>\r <urn2:contractIdentification>14</urn2:contractIdentification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn4:exchangeRateInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:department>dep</urn2:department>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:subDepartment>sudep</urn2:subDepartment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:streetName>22</urn2:streetName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:buildingNumber>2</urn2:buildingNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:postCode>334</urn2:postCode>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:townName>town</urn2:townName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>Sub</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:creditor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:id>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:OrgId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:Id>4201</urn2:Id>\r </urn2:OrgId>\r </urn2:id>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:department>de</urn2:department>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:subDepartment>sude</urn2:subDepartment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:streetName>44</urn2:streetName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:buildingNumber>44</urn2:buildingNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:postCode>345</urn2:postCode>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:townName>town</urn2:townName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>SUbcountry</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn4:creditor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#intCreditAccount}</urn2:identification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency>\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>Remittance</urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn1:transaction>\r <urn1:autoConfirm>DISABLED</urn1:autoConfirm>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:retailPaymentApprovalNeeded>true</urn1:retailPaymentApprovalNeeded>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:fundsCheckRetryDays>1</urn1:fundsCheckRetryDays>\r </urn:paymentMessage>\r </urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Payment Confirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentConfirmRequest>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level-->\r <urn:transactionInput>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:transactionId>${Payment Create#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId>\r </urn:transactionInput>\r </urn:PaymentConfirmRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Payment Approve
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentApproveRequest>\r <urn:transactionInput>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:transactionId>${Payment Create#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId>\r </urn:transactionInput>\r </urn:PaymentApproveRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Payment Read
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentReadRequest> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn:transactionId>${Payment Create#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:paymentReference[1]}</urn:transactionId> </urn:PaymentReadRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
